attributes.action: metroplitian housings sub standard living conditions within social housing.
attributes.additional_details:
From March'16 till now I have been unable to use our bathroom due to a leak from the electric light. I now have no light, part of my ceiling & mould growth.  
We now have a leak going through 5floors of the block, where the pipes are corroding. Metroplitian have been aware of this issue for several weeks yet we're still no closer to resolving this issue  or any of the other issues us tenants are having. STAND UP METROPLITAN TAKE RESPOSIBILITY WE WANT ANSWERS
attributes.background:
After living with metroplitian for the last 7months my living standards & also those of who live with in Metroplitan housing have reached terrible levels. 
I was left with no heating or hot water from December'15-March'16 with 2 children under 3!

rejection.details:
You could complain directly to Metropolitan about this:

https://www.metropolitan.org.uk/customers/quick-links/feedback-complaints/

That page also explains how you can take your complaint further if you are not happy with Metropolitan's response.
